#summary How to install MinGW

Download the MinGW installer entitled 'MinGW-5.1.4.exe installer' from https://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=2435&package_id=240780, and execute it.

During the execution of the installer, select just the g++ compiler to install. Then, accept the suggestion of installing the program in the C:MinGW directory, and you are done.

Once MinGW is properly installed, the next step is to install the MSYS shell environment. To do this follow the instraction in the correspondigne wiki page "InstallingMSYSForWindows".
